Name: XERA: Survival
About the game: Modern, action-oriented open world shooter – raid as a lone wolf or teamed with friends Drop straight back into the fight via rapid helicopter insertions from safe zones Streamlined survival mechanics for people who value action over micro-management Base-building system – gather resources, build, raid, defend & destroy Gather resources & scavenge for weapons, ammo and supplies – craft items such as drones Massive custom 64 sq km map Mission system – rewarded campaign operations - 5 difficulty tiers Regular in-game events: nuclear reactor, compound assault, radio tower, civilian bunker, crashed helicopter – the higher the risk, the greater the reward All new character customization – body type, face, skin, hair, brow, eyes, & full clothing system Collect weapon skins and other customizations, trade up – swap commoner items for a rarer one Steam Marketplace support – trade and sell skins – complete your collections! Compete for every Season’s leaderboard positions in different categories Direct line to development team in our Discord channel Public Roadmap that shows what we have planned for Early Access and beyond: -survival-public-roadmap Commitment to a fair business model for our players – no punishing monetization 2022: The era of AI has arrived. The world is in chaos after a prototype combat robot - banned by law and awaiting secure destruction by XERA Corporation - became self-aware, escaped and began replication on an industrial scale. Failed attempts to remotely shut down the AI simply triggered a war that humanity could not afford to lose. Nation turned on nation in a fight for control over resources to defend against the robots. With the attention of the world’s military elsewhere, disenfranchised operatives have gathered to ransack what was left of the XERA facilities, setting up two forward operating bases, Safe Zones on each side of the forest that was the hiding place for mankind’s greatest failure of leadership. Between these bases there are no rules of engagement. The only imperative is survival. XERA: Survival is developed by Spotted Kiwi Interactive, an independent development company based in the deep south of New Zealand (Aotearoa) with team members around the world: 4 in NZ, 1 in Chile, 1 in Russia and 1 in USA.
